exemptn_no.description: Exemption ID number from the ASR approval letter.

mfr_no.description: Manufacturer Registration Number (CFN or FEI) belonging to the reporting firm.

mfr_name.description: Manufacturer Name, analogous to G1 Manufacturer Name on the 3500A form.

report_id.description: Unique identifier for this ASR report. Duplicate values can indicate initial and supplement reports.

date_of_event.description: The date of the adverse event.

mfr_aware_date.description: The date the manufacturer became aware of the adverse event.

values.M-D: Malfunction where a patient death was reported
values.IN-D: Serious Injury where a patient death was reported

dev_prob_cd.description: A semicolon-delimited list of Device Problem Codes describing the adverse event.

report_year.description: The year the report was submitted.

report_qtr.description: The quarter of the year the report was submitted.

initial_report_flag.description: Indicates whether the report is an initial or supplement.

dev_id.description: Device ID in the ASR database, typically a model or catalog number.

impl_avail_for_eval.description: Indicates whether the device is available for evaluation.

impl_ret_to_mfr.description: Indicates whether the device was returned to the manufacturer.

Ã¯_1.description: Device problem code or patient problem code.

old_to_be_deactivated.description: Description of the problem code to be deactivated.

lifeprod_life_products_inc_the_filing_of.description: Manufacturer disclaimer text indicating that filing the report does not constitute an admission regarding the device event.

619611.description: MDR Report Key reference or related identifier for the device problem data.

1104.description: Code number describing a specific device problem.

mdr_report_key.description: MDR Report Key, a unique identifier for a given MDR.

patient_sequence_no.description: Patient Sequence Number, distinguishing multiple patients in the same report.

problem_code.description: Patient problem code describing adverse event(s) related to the patient.

date_added.description: Date the patient problem code was added.

date_changed.description: Date the patient problem code was changed.

num_fields.description: Number of fields/columns in the table.

num_rows.description: Number of rows in the table.

longest_field_name.description: Longest field name in that table.

longest_field_length.description: Length (in characters) of the longest field name.

description.description: Description or summary of the table.

Merged_Table_4.description: Merged from DEVICE2009, DEVICE2010, DEVICEAdd, foidev1998, DEVICE2003, DEVICE2012, DEVICE2008, DEVICEChange, DEVICE2014, DEVICE2018, DEVICE2002, foidevthru1997, DEVICE2020, DEVICE2007, DEVICE2021, DEVICE2004, DEVICE2022, DEVICE2023, DEVICE2000, DEVICE2019, DEVICE2013, DEVICE2015, DEVICE2006, foidev1999, DEVICE2001, DEVICE2016, DEVICE2011, DEVICE2017, DEVICE2005, DEVICE

mdr_report_key.description: MDR Report Key, a unique key assigned by MAUDE.

device_event_key.description: Device Event Key linking to specific device events.

implant_flag.description: Indicates whether the device is implantable.

device_sequence_no.description: Device Sequence Number for distinguishing multiple devices in one report.

date_received.description: Date the device report was received by FDA or processed in the database.

generic_name.description: Generic or common name of the device (D2).

manufacturer_d_city.description: City where the manufacturer is located.

manufacturer_d_state_code.description: State code where the manufacturer is located.

manufacturer_d_zip_code.description: Zip code for the manufacturer address.

manufacturer_d_postal_code.description: Full postal code for the manufacturer.

device_operator.description: Type of person operating the device (D5).

lot_number.description: Lot number on the device label or packaging (D4).

device_availability.description: Indicates whether the device was available for evaluation (D10).

date_returned_to_manufacturer.description: Date the device was returned to the manufacturer (D10).

device_report_product_code.description: Product Code associated with the device.

device_evaluated_by_manufactur.description: Indicates whether the manufacturer evaluated the device (H3).

combination_product_flag.description: Indicates if the device is part of a combination product (G4).

udi_di.description: UDI-Device Identifier portion of the Unique Device Identifier.

udi_public.description: Full UDI value with non-releasable PI values redacted.

baseline_shelf_life_contained.description: Indicates if shelf life is contained on the label.

baseline_pma_flag.description: Indicates if the device has a PMA.

baseline_510_k__flag.description: Indicates if the device has 510(k) clearance.

baseline_510_k__exempt_flag.description: Indicates if the device is exempt from 510(k).

medicalspecialty.description: Medical Specialty code (e.g., AN, CV, etc.).

productcode.description: Product code assigned to the device.

devicename.description: Official device name, typically noun followed by modifiers.

values.1: Class 1 - Devices subject to General Controls
values.2: Class 2 - Devices subject to General Controls and Special Controls
values.3: Class 3 - Devices subject to General Controls, Special Controls, and Premarket Approval

unclassified_reason.description: Reason for not being classified (if applicable).

gmpexemptflag.description: Indicates if the device is exempt from GMP requirements.

thirdpartyflag.description: Indicates if a third party is involved.

reviewcode.description: Specific review code for the device.

technicalmethod.description: Technical method used by the device.

targetarea.description: Area of use or target site for the device.

implant_flag.description: Indicates if the device is implantable.

life_sustain_support_flag.description: Indicates if the device is life-sustaining or life-supporting.

summarymalfunctionreporting.description: Indicates if malfunction reporting summary applies.

access_type_and_number.description: Access Type and Number referencing the event.

report_type.description: Type of report (e.g., Malfunction, Serious Injury).

closeout_text.description: Text regarding closeout status or final remarks.

Merged_Table_7.description: Merged from mdrfoiChange, mdrfoiThru2023, mdrfoiAdd, mdrfoi

mdr_report_key.description: Unique MDR Report Key assigned by MAUDE.

event_key.description: Event Key for linking to a specific event.

report_number.description: Report Number. May include manufacturer, distributor, or user facility ID with year and sequential count.

manufacturer_link_flag.description: Internal link flag if a distributor report was followed by a manufacturer report.

number_devices_in_event.description: Number of devices involved in this event.

number_patients_in_event.description: Number of patients involved in this event.

adverse_event_flag.description: Indicates if this is an adverse event report.

product_problem_flag.description: Indicates if this is a product problem report.

date_report.description: The date the report was submitted.

date_of_event.description: The date of the eventâs occurrence.

reprocessed_and_reused_flag.description: Indicates if a single-use device was reprocessed/reused.

reporter_occupation_code.description: Occupation code of the initial reporter.

health_professional.description: Whether the reporter was a health professional.

initial_report_to_fda.description: Whether this was initially reported to the FDA.

date_facility_aware.description: Date the facility became aware of the event.

report_date.description: The date the report was made.

report_to_fda.description: Whether the user facility or importer also submitted the report to the FDA.

date_report_to_fda.description: Date the report was sent to the FDA.

event_location.description: Code for the location where the event occurred.

date_report_to_manufacturer.description: Date the facility or importer reported to the manufacturer.

manufacturer_contact_zip_code.description: ZIP code for the manufacturer contact.

manufacturer_contact_zip_ext.description: ZIP extension for the manufacturer contact.

manufacturer_contact_country.description: Country code for the manufacturer contact.

manufacturer_contact_postal.description: Full postal code for the manufacturer contact.

date_manufacturer_received.description: Date the manufacturer received the report.

single_use_flag.description: Indicates if the device is single-use.

remedial_action.description: Whether a remedial action was initiated (e.g., recall, repair).

previous_use_code.description: Indicates prior usage of the device.

removal_correction_number.description: Removal or correction number following 21 CFR Part 806.

distributor_name.description: Name of the distributor, if applicable.

report_to_manufacturer.description: Indicates if the report was sent to the manufacturer.

type_of_report.description: Whether the report is initial or follow-up.

source_type.description: Source(s) through which the manufacturer became aware of the event.

reporter_country_code.description: Country code of the initial reporter.

summary_report.description: Y/N if this is a summary report.

Merged_Table_9.description: Merged from foitext2003, foitext2001, foitext2013, foitext1999, foitext1998, foitext, foitext2010, foitext2000, foitext2008, foitext2009, foitext2018, foitext2021, foitext2006, foitextthru1995, foitext2014, foitext2019, foitext2022, foitext2007, foitext2004, foitext2023, foitext1997, foitext2017, foitext2012, foitext2015, foitext2005, foitextChange, foitextAdd, foitext1996, foitext2002, foitext2011, foitext2016, foitext2020

mdr_report_key.description: Unique MDR Report Key referencing the same MDR in other tables.

mdr_text_key.description: Unique text key for the narrative portion of the report.

patient_sequence_number.description: Patient sequence number if referencing a specific patient in the report.

date_report.description: Date associated with the text or narrative.

foi_text.description: Narrative text describing the event or manufacturer narrative.

Model Number.description: Model number found on the device label or accompanying packaging.

Device Problem.description: Codes describing medical device failures or problems related to the adverse event.

Patient Problem.description: Codes describing patient problems related to the adverse event.

Event Date.description: Date of the actual or best estimate of the first onset of the adverse event.

Event Type.description: Type of reportable event, e.g., death, injury, or malfunction.

Manufacturer Narrative.description: Additional information, evaluation, or clarification provided by the manufacturer in narrative form.

Event Description.description: Description of reported event in narrative form.

Brand Name.description: Trade or proprietary name of the suspect medical device as used in product labeling or in the catalogue.

Type of Device.description: Generic or common name of the suspect medical device or a generally descriptive name.

Manufacturer (Section D).description: Full name and address of the manufacturer of the suspect medical device.

Manufacturer (Section G).description: Full name and address of the manufacturer site.

Manufacturer Contact.description: Full name and address of the manufacturer reporting contact.

MDR Report Key.description: Unique key for an MDR, assigned by MAUDE.

MDR Text Key.description: Unique key for the first narrative entered for this report, assigned by MAUDE.

Report Number.description: Number assigned to the MDR, format varies based on the source.

Device Sequence Number.description: Differentiates between each device in reports with multiple devices.

Product Code.description: Product Code of the suspected medical device.

UDI-Device Identifier.description: DI portion of the Unique Device Identifier.

UDI-Public.description: Full UDI value with certain PI values redacted.

Combination Product (y/n).description: Denotes whether the suspect product is part of a combination product.

PMA/PMN Number.description: Approved PMA or cleared 510(k), or premarket notification number for the device.

Exemption Number.description: Exemption/Variance Number identifying MDR reports under special reporting conditions.

Number of Events Reported.description: Number of events described in the report.

Summary Report (Y/N).description: Denotes whether the report summarizes multiple reports.

Report Source.description: Denotes whether the report was submitted by a Manufacturer, Distributor, User Facility, or Voluntary reporter.

Source Type.description: How the manufacturer became aware of the reported adverse event.

Remedial Action.description: Whether a remedial action (e.g., recall) was initiated.

Type of Report.description: Denotes whether the report is an initial report or a follow-up report.

Report Date.description: Date the report was submitted to FDA.

Device was involved in event.description: Number of devices included in the report.

Patient was involved in event.description: Number of patients included in the report.

Is this an Adverse Event Report?.description: Denotes whether the use of a medical device is suspected to have resulted in an adverse outcome in a patient.

Device Operator.description: Denotes the type of person operating or using the suspect medical device.

Device Expiration Date.description: The expiration date found on the device itself or printed on the accompanying packaging.

Device Model Number.description: Model number found on the device label or accompanying packaging.

Device Catalogue Number.description: Catalogue number found in the manufacturer's catalogue, device labeling, or accompanying packaging.

Device Lot Number.description: Lot number found on the label or packaging material.

Other Device ID Number.description: Subfield retired in 2018 for additional device identifiers.

Was Device Available for Evaluation?.description: Denotes whether the device was available for manufacturer evaluation.

Date Returned to Manufacturer.description: If returned, the date the device was sent back to the manufacturer.

Is the Reporter a Health Professional?.description: Denotes whether the initial reporter is a health professional.

Was the Report Sent to FDA?.description: Denotes whether a user facility or importer sent a separate report of the same event to FDA.

Distributor Facility Aware Date.description: Date that the user facility's medical personnel or the importer became aware of the event.

Device Age.description: Age of the device or a best estimate.

Event Location.description: Location of actual occurrence of the event.

Date Report to Manufacturer.description: Date report was sent to manufacturer from a user facility or importer.

Initial Date FDA Received.description: Date that the initial report was received in eMDR by FDA.

Supplement Dates FDA Received.description: Dates that any supplement or follow-up reports were received in eMDR by FDA.

Initial Date Manufacturer Received.description: Date when a manufacturer received information that a reportable event occurred.

Supplement Dates Manufacturer Received.description: Dates that the manufacturer received follow-up information.

Was Device Evaluated by Manufacturer?.description: Denotes whether the manufacturer evaluated the suspect or a related device.

Date Device Manufactured.description: Date of the manufacturing of the suspect medical device.

Is the Device Single Use?.description: Denotes whether the device was labeled for single use or not.

Is This a Reprocessed and Reused Single-.description: Denotes whether a single use device was reprocessed or reused on a patient.

Type of Device Usage.description: Denotes whether the use of the suspect medical device was the initial use, reuse, or unknown.

Removal/Correction Number.description: Correction or removal number following the format directed by 21 CFR Part 806.

MDRFOI.description: Contains master/base event records for each report.

DEVICE.description: Contains device details for each event.

TEXT.description: Contains narrative text from sections B5, H3, H10.

MDR Report Key.description: Unique identifier assigned by MAUDE for an MDR.

Manufacturer Narrative.description: Additional information or evaluation from the manufacturer.

Event Description.description: Narrative description of the reported event.

Review Panel Codes.description: Two-letter codes indicating the medical specialty panel responsible for reviewing the product.

Device Class.description: Refers to the level of CDRH regulation of a given device.

values.1: Class 1 - Devices subject to General Controls
values.2: Class 2 - Devices subject to General Controls and Special Controls
values.3: Class 3 - Devices subject to General Controls, Special Controls, and Premarket Approval

MAUDE_Downloadable_Files.description: Provides downloadable zipped data files that consist of various types of medical device reports.

Compressed Size in Bytes.description: Size of the compressed file in bytes.

Uncompressed Size in Bytes.description: Size of the uncompressed file in bytes.

Total Records.description: Total number of records in the file.

reporter_occupation_code.description: Codes representing the occupation of the initial reporter.

event_location_code_key.description: Codes representing the location where the event occurred.
